00034 #include "node_composite_util.h"
00035 
00036 static bNodeSocketTemplate cmp_node_movieclip_out[]= {
00037     {   SOCK_RGBA,      0,  "Image"},
00038     {   SOCK_FLOAT,     1,  "Offset X"},
00039     {   SOCK_FLOAT,     1,  "Offset Y"},
00040     {   SOCK_FLOAT,     1,  "Scale"},
00041     {   SOCK_FLOAT,     1,  "Angle"},
00042     {   -1, 0, ""   }
00043 };
00044 
00045 static CompBuf *node_composit_get_movieclip(RenderData *rd, MovieClip *clip, MovieClipUser *user)
00046 {
00047     ImBuf *orig_ibuf, *ibuf;
00048     CompBuf *stackbuf;
00049     int type;
00050 
00051     float *rect;
00052     int alloc= FALSE;
00053 
00054     orig_ibuf= BKE_movieclip_get_ibuf(clip, user);
00055 
00056     if (orig_ibuf==NULL || (orig_ibuf->rect==NULL && orig_ibuf->rect_float==NULL)) {
00057         IMB_freeImBuf(orig_ibuf);
00058         return NULL;
00059     }
00060 
00061     ibuf= IMB_dupImBuf(orig_ibuf);
00062     IMB_freeImBuf(orig_ibuf);
00063 
00064     if (ibuf->rect_float == NULL || ibuf->userflags&IB_RECT_INVALID) {
00065         IMB_float_from_rect(ibuf);
00066         ibuf->userflags&= ~IB_RECT_INVALID;
00067     }
00068 
00069     /* now we need a float buffer from the image with matching color management */
00070     if (ibuf->channels == 4) {
00071         rect= node_composit_get_float_buffer(rd, ibuf, &alloc);
00072     }
00073     else {
00074         /* non-rgba passes can't use color profiles */
00075         rect= ibuf->rect_float;
00076     }
00077     /* done coercing into the correct color management */
00078 
00079     if (!alloc) {
00080         rect= MEM_dupallocN(rect);
00081         alloc= 1;
00082     }
00083 
00084     type= ibuf->channels;
00085 
00086     if (rd->scemode & R_COMP_CROP) {
00087         stackbuf= get_cropped_compbuf(&rd->disprect, rect, ibuf->x, ibuf->y, type);
00088         if (alloc)
00089             MEM_freeN(rect);
00090     }
00091     else {
00092         /* we put imbuf copy on stack, cbuf knows rect is from other ibuf when freed! */
00093         stackbuf= alloc_compbuf(ibuf->x, ibuf->y, type, FALSE);
00094         stackbuf->rect= rect;
00095         stackbuf->malloc= alloc;
00096     }
00097 
00098     IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
00099 
00100     return stackbuf;
00101 }
00102 
00103 static void node_composit_exec_movieclip(void *data, bNode *node, bNodeStack **UNUSED(in), bNodeStack **out)
00104 {
00105     if (node->id) {
00106         RenderData *rd= data;
00107         MovieClip *clip= (MovieClip *)node->id;
00108         MovieClipUser *user= (MovieClipUser *)node->storage;
00109         CompBuf *stackbuf= NULL;
00110 
00111         BKE_movieclip_user_set_frame(user, rd->cfra);
00112 
00113         stackbuf= node_composit_get_movieclip(rd, clip, user);
00114 
00115         if (stackbuf) {
00116             MovieTrackingStabilization *stab= &clip->tracking.stabilization;
00117 
00118             /* put image on stack */
00119             out[0]->data= stackbuf;
00120 
00121             if (stab->flag&TRACKING_2D_STABILIZATION) {
00122                 float loc[2], scale, angle;
00123 
00124                 BKE_tracking_stabilization_data(&clip->tracking, rd->cfra, stackbuf->x, stackbuf->y,
00125                             loc, &scale, &angle);
00126 
00127                 out[1]->vec[0]= loc[0];
00128                 out[2]->vec[0]= loc[1];
00129 
00130                 out[3]->vec[0]= scale;
00131                 out[4]->vec[0]= angle;
00132             }
00133 
00134             /* generate preview */
00135             generate_preview(data, node, stackbuf);
00136         }
00137     }
00138 }
00139 
00140 static void init(bNodeTree *UNUSED(ntree), bNode *node, bNodeTemplate *UNUSED(ntemp))
00141 {
00142     MovieClipUser *user= MEM_callocN(sizeof(MovieClipUser), "node movie clip user");
00143 
00144     node->storage= user;
00145     user->framenr= 1;
00146 }
00147 
00148 void register_node_type_cmp_movieclip(bNodeTreeType *ttype)
00149 {
00150     static bNodeType ntype;
00151 
00152     node_type_base(ttype, &ntype, CMP_NODE_MOVIECLIP, "Movie Clip", NODE_CLASS_INPUT, NODE_PREVIEW|NODE_OPTIONS);
00153     node_type_socket_templates(&ntype, NULL, cmp_node_movieclip_out);
00154     node_type_size(&ntype, 120, 80, 300);
00155     node_type_init(&ntype, init);
00156     node_type_storage(&ntype, "MovieClipUser", node_free_standard_storage, node_copy_standard_storage);
00157     node_type_exec(&ntype, node_composit_exec_movieclip);
00158 
00159     nodeRegisterType(ttype, &ntype);
00160 }
